description.value: The character is accompanied by a specialized vox-tech operator who extends the reach of the character's command through advanced communications equipment.

system.benefit: Character is accompanied by a Vox-Tech who relays orders to the squad, as long as Character's Comrade is in Cohesion, all of the character's orders affect all comrades within vox range.

specialAbilities.name: Extended Command Range
specialAbilities.description: You are accompanied by a Vox-Tech comrade. When your Vox-Tech is in Cohesion, all of your orders affect all comrades within vox range rather than just those in Cohesion.
